entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main validation-sdk-.NET Core SDK 3.1.1xx, sdk, .NET Core SDK 3.1.1xx #sdk-117297-.NETCoreSDK3.1.1xx #22493
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main validation-sdk-.NET Core SDK 3.1.4xx, sdk, .NET Core SDK 3.1.4xx #sdk-117294-.NETCoreSDK3.1.4xx #22492
  • Extra period on error message #22490
  • 'dotnet new' doesn't support net7.0 TFM #22488

Closed

  • BUG: FileVersion, ProductVerison is missing for Wrapper-Exe in .net 6 RC2 #22396
  • Implement an option for restore/build/publish commands that disable build servers. #10288
    7.0.1xx
  • `dotnet tool install --interactive` times out with .NET 6 preview SDK #18615
    6.0.2xx
  • PublishSingleFile=true does not result in a true single-file publish #14489

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add disable build server CLI option #22472
    Area-CLI
  • Remove OpCodes from event source to make events appear correctly #22458
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Blazor AOT Publish Tests #22477
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update build.yml #22361
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #22460
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Ensure references added using "Reference" are correctly copied in BlazorWASM projects #22470
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Port to 6.0.2xx] Update System.CommandLine version #22351
    Area-CLI
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on 5.0.4xx #20865
    Area-Infrastructure
